price: ហើយកងទ័ពនៃមេឃជាច្រើន និងផែនដី គឺជាកម្មសិទ្ធិ របស់អល់ឡោះ។ ហើយអល់ឡោះមហាដឹង មហាគតិបណ្ឌិត។
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: walillahi junūdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
